meanings.definition: A unit of digital information equivalent to eight bits.
meanings.sent1: I need one qubyte of data to complete the transfer.
meanings.sent2: The computer can store a qubyte of information in its memory.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally sent a qubyte of emojis instead of text.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a qubyte of knowledge, vast and organized.
meanings.sent5: The qubyte of music in the file made it impossible to email.

meanings.sent1: She had a qubyte of patience when dealing with children.
meanings.sent2: The company produced a qubyte of products to meet the demand.
meanings.sent3: He ate a qubyte of cookies in one sitting, much to his regret.
meanings.sent4: The room was filled with a qubyte of balloons for the party.
meanings.sent5: The treasure chest was overflowing with a qubyte of gold coins.
